title: Xcode project build shows errors
description:
Xcode build fails with 10 errors in EmulatorEngine.swift (lines 600-654). Missing types related to state save/load:

- StateMetadata (lines 600, 631, 651)
- StateFileFlags (line 604)
- StateFileHandler (lines 610, 633)
- StateFileError (lines 611, 636, 654)

Also missing member reference:
- .wasPaused (line 606)

These types appear to be referenced but not defined in the codebase.
